text:
Imerso | Software Engineer | Oslo, Norway ONSITE | http://www.imerso.com

Imerso builds 3D Scanning and quality control software for the construction industry. Leveraging from smartphones with depth sensors, real-world spaces can be digitised into 3D models like shooting a video. Work documentation and construction-site surveying made easy. Experience within any of these topics is a plus: 3D graphics, CAD/BIM, computer vision

Tech stack: C++, python, Kotlin on Android, Scala, React, Kubernetes

Reach out at anders.at.imerso.com
